HDG.ID.content: man & Being are both challenged to let beings appear, the gathering of this challenge (Herausforderns): Ge-stell [framework] [planning, calculating (Berechenbarkeit)]
HDG.ID.linkedContent: man & Being are both challenged to let beings appear, the gathering of this challenge (Herausforderns): Ge-stell [framework] [planning, calculating (Berechenbarkeit)]

HDG.ID.content: Ge-stell: mutual challenge of man & Being to enter calculation of what is calculable > were Ge-stell to address itself to us as Ereignis, which first surrenders man & Being to their own being, path open to experience beings in more originary way [halfwayness doesn’t cut it]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.ID.linkedContent: Ge-stell: mutual challenge of man & Being to enter calculation of what is calculable > were Ge-stell to address itself to us as Ereignis, which first surrenders man & Being to their own being, path open to experience beings in more originary way [halfwayness doesn’t cut it]

HDG.BC.content: the appearance of freedom in calculation: servitude under dominion of constantly “needed,” i.e. utility: freedom & magnificence of consumption (Nutzniessung) & its increase
HDG.BC.linkedContent: the appearance of freedom in calculation: servitude under dominion of constantly “needed,” i.e. utility: freedom & magnificence of consumption (Nutzniessung) & its increase

HDG.BC.content: man attends (achtet) either to his needs (braucht) or what he can do w/out; latter not calculation, considers everything from a standpoint limited to essential: only apparent restriction, really a release into expanse of demands that befit man’s essence, attending to dispensable (Entbehrliche) brings man into simplicity, totally other (ganz anderen) domain [no calculation = limited to essential?]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.BC.linkedContent: man attends (achtet) either to his needs (braucht) or what he can do w/out; latter not calculation, considers everything from a standpoint limited to essential: only apparent restriction, really a release into expanse of demands that befit man’s essence, attending to dispensable (Entbehrliche) brings man into simplicity, totally other (ganz anderen) domain [no calculation = limited to essential?]

HDG.BC.content: man, ready for what is always original, or knows better > universal currency of historiological science, calculating “attitude” toward history, begins w/ ascendancy of Christianity: relation to essential reckoned into otherwise calculable

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.BC.linkedContent: man, ready for what is always original, or knows better > universal currency of historiological science, calculating “attitude” toward history, begins w/ ascendancy of Christianity: relation to essential reckoned into otherwise calculable

HDG.BC.content: [on style] Ground-Concepts as demand to reach ground of all that is, of what can therefore be called beings > anticipation of essential (Wesenhaft) more vital (wesentlich) than certainty of calculating the w/out essence (Wesenlos) > thinking in anticipation (Ahnen), for anticipation, essentially more rigorous/exacting than formal-conceptual cleverness of calculable: we must practice such knowing, readiness to make ourselves free for essential

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.BC.linkedContent: [on style] Ground-Concepts as demand to reach ground of all that is, of what can therefore be called beings > anticipation of essential (Wesenhaft) more vital (wesentlich) than certainty of calculating the w/out essence (Wesenlos) > thinking in anticipation (Ahnen), for anticipation, essentially more rigorous/exacting than formal-conceptual cleverness of calculable: we must practice such knowing, readiness to make ourselves free for essential

HDG.WM.content: no annihilation (Vernichtung) of whole of beings takes place in anxiety > nothing doesn’t attract, essentially repelling (abweisend) > nothing itself nihilates (das Nichts selbst nichtet), grants the nothing, not submitted to calculation of annihilation or negation (Verneinung) > nihilation manifests beings in heretofore concealed strangeness as what is radically other (schlechthin Andere) [totally other] re: nothing > originally nihilating nothing brings Dasein, for 1st time, before beings as such—in anxiety original openness of Being

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

motif.name: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"
motif.title: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"

HDG.WM.linkedContent: no annihilation (Vernichtung) of whole of beings takes place in anxiety > nothing doesn’t attract, essentially repelling (abweisend) > nothing itself nihilates (das Nichts selbst nichtet), grants the nothing, not submitted to calculation of annihilation or negation (Verneinung) > nihilation manifests beings in heretofore concealed strangeness as what is radically other (schlechthin Andere) [totally other] re: nothing > originally nihilating nothing brings Dasein, for 1st time, before beings as such—in anxiety original openness of Being

HDG.FS.content: how same expression can move from metaphysical to non-metaphysical language: 1) inner illumination (innere Erleuchtung), being itself announces itself (sich bekundet), that Dasein unfolds (ausbildet) ein “Seinsverständnis,” Seinsfrage in Sein und Zeit calls for a renewal (Erneuerung) of language 2) favorable external conditions: a) decline (Verfall) and impoverishment (Verarmung) of language [compare to rich language of brothers Grimm] b) fixing of language in computer calculation stops its natural growth

motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.MA.content: calculative thinking (never stops, never collects itself): computing, when we plan, research, organize, we reckon w/ given conditions, calculated intention of conditions serving specific purposes, count on definite results > meditative thinking: contemplates meaning that reigns in everything that is
HDG.MA.linkedContent: calculative thinking (never stops, never collects itself): computing, when we plan, research, organize, we reckon w/ given conditions, calculated intention of conditions serving specific purposes, count on definite results > meditative thinking: contemplates meaning that reigns in everything that is

HDG.WL.content: [re: Ge-stell (Framing)] speaking challenged to correspond totally to Ge-stell, in which all present beings (Anwesenden) can be commandeered, speaking turns to information > informs itself about itself to safeguard its procedures > formalization (calculated availability [rechnerische Bestellbarkeit] of Saying) is goal/norm > even to say that nature of language can’t become part of formalism’s calculations, “natural language” being described negatively

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.OHF.content: scope (Umkreis) of factical understanding can’t be calculated, worked-out in advance (nicht im vorhinein und nie auszurechnen) > hermeneutics engages itself, brings itself into play (einsetzt)—from there understanding is possible
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: scope (Umkreis) of factical understanding can’t be calculated, worked-out in advance (nicht im vorhinein und nie auszurechnen) > hermeneutics engages itself, brings itself into play (einsetzt)—from there understanding is possible
